title: Greatness, Aretha Franklin, Comedy Roulette, OCD and more.
itunes:title: Greatness, Aretha Franklin, Comedy Roulette, OCD and more.
description:
Happy Friday!  Welcome to the ride.  Today's show is dedicated to those that strive for greatness.  We are are the 1 year anniversary of Aretha Franklin's death.  Women have the uncanny ability to take what men do and make it into something.  Ever go to somebody's house and they are just missing something?  Uncle Steve shares his fondest memories of his friend Aretha Franklin.  Comedy Roulette lands on the subject of now that I have money, you know who I am.  Millennials eventually will grow up and we have the things that they will be saying once that point is reached.  Find out the OCD tendencies of the crew.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about Aretha Franklin and more.  Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
